name: Zompacolypse
description: In this game, you can play on Linux, Windows and Android as the last surviving ninja in the world and possibly the person. At the door of the house in this game if you push up, you will enter the house being safe from the zombies. However, the zombies will continue to spawn making it difficult to exit. On future updates, the house will be destructible.  X exits the game and A shoots while B throws a knife. Try to beat your score.
